TypeSignature.Value: public sealed class Pen : MarshalByRefObject, ICloneable, IDisposable
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Pen extends System.MarshalByRefObject implements class System.ICloneable, class System.IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class Pen Inherits MarshalByRefObject Implements ICloneable, IDisposable
public ref class Pen sealed : MarshalByRefObject, ICloneable, IDisposable

summary.span: 定義用來繪製直線與曲線的物件。

span.span: Defines an object used to draw lines and curves.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A繪製指定的寬度和樣式的線條。A draws a line of specified width and style. 使用来繪製之短折線的多種不同的屬性。Use the property to draw several varieties of dashed lines. 繪製的線條可以填入各種填入樣式填滿，包含純色和紋理。The line drawn by a can be filled in a variety of fill styles, including solid colors and textures. 填滿樣式取決於筆刷或紋理做為填滿物件。The fill style depends on brush or texture that is used as the fill object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構與和設定的效果屬性。The following code example demonstrates constructing a with a and the effects of setting the property on a . 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`ShowLineJoin`方法時處理表單的事件，將傳遞`e`為。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowLineJoin` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會決定如何繪製線條。The property determines how the draws lines. 線條會繪製，如同它們是填滿的矩形，使用指定的特性。Lines are drawn as if they are filled rectangles, with the characteristics of the specified . 屬性的新設為 1 （預設值）。The property of the new is set to 1 (the default). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建構與和設定的效果屬性。The following code example demonstrates constructing a with a and the effects of setting the property on a . 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`ShowLineJoin`方法時處理表單的事件，將傳遞`e`為。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowLineJoin` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定中指定的色彩為`brush`參數，屬性設定中指定的值為`width`參數和單位設定為。The is set to the color specified in the `brush` parameter, the property is set to the value specified in the `width` parameter, and the units are set to . 請注意，`brush`參數也會指定屬性這。Note that the `brush` parameter also specifies the property of this . A`width`為 0 會導致繪製如同寬度是 1。A `width` of 0 will result in the drawing as if the width were 1. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立示範設定作用的和屬性。The following code example creates a and demonstrates the effects of setting the and properties on a . 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`ShowStartAndEndCaps`方法時處理表單的事件，將傳遞`e`為。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowStartAndEndCaps` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性設定為指定的色彩`color`參數。The property is set to the color specified by the `color` parameter. 屬性設定中指定的值為`width`參數。The property is set to the value specified in the `width` parameter. A`width`為 0 會導致繪製如同寬度是 1。A `width` of 0 will result in the drawing as if the width were 1. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立和設定的效果， ，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates creating a and the effects of setting the , , and properties. 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`ShowPensAndSmoothingMode`方法時處理表單的事件，將傳遞做為 e 。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowPensAndSmoothingMode` method when handling the form's event, passing e as . MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Drawing2D::PenAlignment Alignment { System::Drawing::Drawing2D::PenAlignment get(); void set(System::Drawing::Drawing2D::PenAlignment value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個 的對齊。

span.span: Gets or sets the alignment for this .
A that represents the alignment for this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會決定如何繪製封閉型曲線和多邊形。This property determines how the draws closed curves and polygons. 列舉型別指定五個值; 不過，只有兩個值 —和— 會變更繪製線條的外觀。The enumeration specifies five values; however, only two values— and —will change the appearance of a drawn line. 預設值，這個屬性，並指定的畫筆寬度會集中在曲線或多邊形的外框。 is the default value for this property and specifies that the width of the pen is centered on the outline of the curve or polygon. 值為這個屬性指定的畫筆寬度位於曲線或多邊形的外框。A value of for this property specifies that the width of the pen is inside the outline of the curve or polygon. 其他三個值， ， ，和，將會導致內置畫筆。The other three values, , , and , will result in a pen that is centered. A具有設為其對齊會產生不可靠的結果，有時繪製內凹位置中，有時在置中的位置。A that has its alignment set to will yield unreliable results, sometimes drawing in the inset position and sometimes in the centered position. 此外，內凹畫筆無法用來繪製複合線條和無法繪製的短折線虛線大寫字。Also, an inset pen cannot be used to draw compound lines and cannot draw dashed lines with dash caps.

exception.span: 指定的值不是 的成員。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 。Creates a . - 建立一份該畫筆。Creates a copy of that pen. - 畫面上，使用畫筆副本來繪製直線。Draws a line to the screen, using the copy of the pen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <float> ^ CompoundArray { cli::array <float> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <float> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定指定複合畫筆的值陣列。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of values that specifies a compound pen.

summary.span: 複合畫筆會繪製由平行線和間距組成的複合直線。

span.span: A compound pen draws a compound line made up of parallel lines and spaces.

value.span: 實數陣列，指定複合陣列。

span.span: An array of real numbers that specifies the compound array.

value.span: 陣列中的元素必須使用遞增順序，不小於 0 且不大於 1。

span.span: The elements in the array must be in increasing order, not less than 0, and not greater than 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 複合直線會組成替代平行線和間距的變動寬度。A compound line is made up of alternating parallel lines and spaces of varying widths. 陣列中的值會指定複合畫筆寬度的相對行的每個元件的起點。The values in the array specify the starting points of each component of the compound line relative to the pen's width. 陣列中的第一個值，指定第一個元件 （列） 的位置為距離的分數的畫筆寬度。The first value in the array specifies where the first component (a line) begins as a fraction of the distance across the width of the pen. 陣列中的第二個值會指定距離的分數為下一個元件 （空格） 開頭的畫筆寬度。The second value in the array specifies the beginning of the next component (a space) as a fraction of the distance across the width of the pen. 陣列中的最終值會指定最後一個元件的結束位置。The final value in the array specifies where the last component ends. 假設您想的畫筆來繪製兩條平行線的第一行寬度所在的畫筆寬度的 20%，空間用來分隔兩個線條的寬度是 50%的畫筆 ' s 寬度，以及第二行的寬度為百分之 30 的畫筆的寬度。Suppose you want a pen to draw two parallel lines where the width of the first line is 20 percent of the pen's width, the width of the space that separates the two lines is 50 percent of the pen' s width, and the width of the second line is 30 percent of the pen's width. 藉由建立啟動和實際數字的陣列。Start by creating a and an array of real numbers. 設定複合陣列值 0.0、 0.2，0.7 和 1.0 的陣列傳遞給這個屬性。Set the compound array by passing the array with the values 0.0, 0.2, 0.7, and 1.0 to this property. 如果未設定此屬性具有其屬性設定為。Do not set this property if the has its property set to .

exception.span: 屬性設定於不可變動的 上，例如 類別傳回的項目。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 未設定這個屬性為如果具有其屬性設定為。Do not set this property to if the has its property set to . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例將示範如何建立和設定的效果， ，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates creating a and the effects of setting the , , and properties. 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`ShowPensAndSmoothingMode`方法時處理表單的事件，將傳遞`e`為。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowPensAndSmoothingMode` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <float> ^ DashPattern { cli::array <float> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <float> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定自訂虛線和間距的陣列。

span.span: Gets or sets an array of custom dashes and spaces.

value.span: 實數陣列，指定短折線中交替的虛線和間距的長度。

span.span: An array of real numbers that specifies the lengths of alternating dashes and spaces in dashed lines.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 指派值以外`null`給這個屬性會設定屬性，這個至。Assigning a value other than `null` to this property will set the property for this to . 中的項目`dashArray`陣列虛線圖樣中設定每個虛線和空間的長度。The elements in the `dashArray` array set the length of each dash and space in the dash pattern. 第一個項目集虛線的長度，第二個元素設定間距的長度，第三個元素設定的虛線和等等的長度。The first element sets the length of a dash, the second element sets the length of a space, the third element sets the length of a dash, and so on. 因此，每個項目應該非零的正數。Consequently, each element should be a non-zero positive number. 每個虛線和虛線圖樣中的空間的長度是陣列中的項目值的產品和寬度。The length of each dash and space in the dash pattern is the product of the element value in the array and the width of the . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定作用的， ，和屬性。The following code example demonstrates the effects of setting the , , and properties. 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`ShowPensAndSmoothingMode`方法時處理表單的事件，將傳遞`e`為。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowPensAndSmoothingMode` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.PensExample#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.PensExample#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.PensExample#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/VB/form1.vb#3)]

summary.span: 取得或設定樣式，用於以這個 所繪製的短折線。

span.span: Gets or sets the style used for dashed lines drawn with this .

value.span: ，表示以這個 所繪製之短折線所用的樣式。

span.span: A that represents the style used for dashed lines drawn with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值為這個屬性會指定所定義的虛線和間距，自訂模式屬性，構成與這個繪製的直線。A value of for this property specifies that a custom pattern of dashes and spaces, defined by the property, makes up lines drawn with this . 如果這個屬性的值為和值屬性是`null`，畫筆繪製實線。If the value of this property is and the value of the property is `null`, the pen draws solid lines.

summary.span: 釋放此 所使用的所有資源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 呼叫允許所使用的資源都重新配置用於其他用途。Calling allows the resources used by this to be reallocated for other purposes. 使用完畢時，請呼叫 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法會將 保留在無法使用的狀態。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在呼叫，您必須釋放所有參考讓記憶體回收行程可以回收記憶體的所佔用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 在您釋放最後一個 參考之前，請務必呼叫 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否則工作窗格所使用的資源不會釋放，直到記憶體回收行程呼叫 物件的 `Finalize` 方法。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定作用的和屬性，並示範如何呼叫方法。The following code example demonstrates the effects of setting the and properties, and shows how to call the method for a . 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`ShowLineJoin`方法時處理表單的事件，將傳遞`e`為。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowLineJoin` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 在記憶體回收開始前，允許物件嘗試釋放資源，並執行其他清除作業。

span.span: Allows an object to try to free resources and perform other cleanup operations before it is reclaimed by garbage collection.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Drawing2D::LineJoin LineJoin { System::Drawing::Drawing2D::LineJoin get(); void set(System::Drawing::Drawing2D::LineJoin value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定以這個 所繪製之兩條連續直線末端的接合樣式。

span.span: Gets or sets the join style for the ends of two consecutive lines drawn with this .

value.span: ，表示以這個 所繪製之兩條連續直線末端的接合樣式。

span.span: A that represents the join style for the ends of two consecutive lines drawn with this .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 線聯結是由其結束符合或重疊的兩個線條的一般區域。A line join is the common area that is formed by two lines whose ends meet or overlap. 有三個線條聯結樣式： 儀表、 斜面，和捨入。There are three line join styles: miter, bevel, and round. 當您指定的線條聯結樣式物件聯結樣式將會套用到所有連接的直線任何使用該畫筆繪製的物件。下圖顯示斜面的線條聯結範例的結果。When you specify a line join style for a object, that join style will be applied to all the connected lines in any object drawn using that pen.The following illustration shows the results of the beveled line join example. ![畫筆](~/add/media/pens5.gif "畫筆")![Pens](~/add/media/pens5.gif "Pens") ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定作用的和屬性。The following code example demonstrates the effects of setting the and properties on a . 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`ShowLineJoin`方法時處理表單的事件，將傳遞`e`為。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowLineJoin` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as . [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.PensExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.PensExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

exception.span: 屬性設定於不可變動的 上，例如 類別傳回的項目。

span.span: The property is set on an immutable , such as those returned by the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property float MiterLimit { float get(); void set(float value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定斜接角上的接合厚度限制。

span.span: Gets or sets the limit of the thickness of the join on a mitered corner.

value.span: 斜接角上的接合厚度限制。

span.span: The limit of the thickness of the join on a mitered corner.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 斜接角長度是從內部聯結線牆面的交集的距離，外部聯結線牆面的交集。The miter length is the distance from the intersection of the line walls on the inside of the join to the intersection of the line walls outside of the join. 小型兩行之間的角度時，斜接角長度可能很大。The miter length can be large when the angle between two lines is small. 斜接角限制為筆劃寬度斜接角長度的最大允許的比率。The miter limit is the maximum allowed ratio of miter length to stroke width. 預設值為 10.0 f。The default value is 10.0f. 如果交集的聯結斜接角長度超過限制的聯結，聯結將斜保持聯結的交集的限制內。If the miter length of the join of the intersection exceeds the limit of the join, then the join will be beveled to keep it within the limit of the join of the intersection.

exception.span: 屬性設定於不可變動的 上，例如 類別傳回的項目。

span.span: The property is set on an immutable , such as those returned by the class.

summary.span: 將這個 的轉換矩陣乘以指定的 。

span.span: Multiplies the transformation matrix for this by the specified .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法的前面加上指定的乘法矩陣`matrix`乘法運算的轉換矩陣的參數。This method prepends the multiplication matrix specified in the `matrix` parameter to the transformation matrix for the multiplication operation. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 。Creates a . - 繪製一條線到螢幕。Draws a line to the screen. - 轉換矩陣乘以畫筆的所指定的矩陣。Multiplies the transformation matrix of the pen by the specified matrix. - 使用轉換的畫筆繪製線條。Draws a line with the transformed pen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/VB/form1.vb#2)]

[!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CS/form1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/VB/form1.vb#3)]

value.span: 列舉，指定以這個 所繪製的直線樣式。

remarks.format: ## Remarks A實線、 填滿的直線或材質的線條，根據指定的樣式來的成員可以繪製列舉型別。A can draw solid lines, filled lines, or textured lines, depending on the style specified by a member of the enumeration.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ResetTransform() cil managed

summary.span: 將這個 的幾何轉換矩陣重設為單位矩陣。

span.span: Resets the geometric transformation matrix for this to identity.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 。Creates a . - 設定要在 x 軸方向縮放 2 倍畫筆的變換矩陣。Sets the transformation matrix of the pen to scale 2 times in the x-axis direction. - 繪製一條線到螢幕。Draws a line to the screen. - 轉換矩陣重設識別。Resets the transformation matrix to identity. - 繪製至畫面的第二行。Draws a second line to the screen. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CS/form1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/VB/form1.vb#4)]

param.name: angle
param.span: 旋轉的角度。

span.span: Rotates the local geometric transformation by the specified angle.

summary.span: 這個方法會將旋轉附加到轉換之前。

span.span: This method prepends the rotation to the transformation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為畫筆的形狀是循環，所以旋轉沒有任何視覺效果除非 x 或 y 軸方向縮放畫筆。Because the shape of a pen is circular, a rotation does not have any visible effect unless the pen is scaled in the x- or y-axis direction. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 。Creates a . - 繪製矩形，使用畫筆。Draws a rectangle using the pen. - 在 x 軸方向中的 2 倍縮放畫筆。Scales the pen by 2 times in the x-axis direction. - 順時針旋轉 90 度旋轉畫筆。Rotates the pen 90 degrees clockwise. - 繪製的第二個矩形來示範的差異。Draws a second rectangle to demonstrate the difference. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CS/form1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/VB/form1.vb#5)]

span.span: Rotates the local geometric transformation by the specified angle in the specified order.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為畫筆的形狀是循環，所以旋轉沒有任何視覺效果除非 x 或 y 軸方向縮放畫筆。Because the shape of a pen is circular, a rotation does not have any visible effect unless the pen is scaled in the x- or y-axis direction. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 該程式碼執行下列動作：The code performs the following actions: - 建立 。Creates a . - 在 x 軸方向中的 2 倍縮放畫筆。Scales the pen by 2 times in the x-axis direction. - 繪製矩形，使用畫筆。Draws a rectangle using the pen. - 順時針旋轉 90 度旋轉畫筆。Rotates the pen 90 degrees clockwise. - 繪製的第二個矩形來示範的差異。Draws a second rectangle to demonstrate the difference. [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CS/form1.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/VB/form1.vb#6)]

public: void SetLineCap(System::Drawing::Drawing2D::LineCap startCap, System::Drawing::Drawing2D::LineCap endCap, System::Drawing::Drawing2D::DashCap dashCap);

param.name: startCap
param.span: ，代表以這個 所繪製之直線開端所用的帽緣樣式。

span.span: A that represents the cap style to use at the beginning of lines drawn with this .

param.name: endCap

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例設計用於搭配 Windows Form，且其需要 `e`，這是參數的事件處理常式。The following code example is designed for use with Windows Forms, and it requires `e`, which is a parameter of the event handler. 程式碼會建立並將它繪製的直線開端箭頭錨點端點設定：The code creates a and sets it to draw arrow anchor caps at the beginning of lines: [!code-cpp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CPP/form1.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/CS/form1.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Drawing.ClassicPenExamples/VB/form1.vb#9)]

summary.span: 取得或設定這個 幾何轉換的複本。

span.span: Gets or sets a copy of the geometric transformation for this .

value.span: 的複本，代表這個 的幾何轉換。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會定義為畫筆筆尖的橢圓形。This property defines an elliptical shape for the pen tip. 此橢圓形取自預設循環圖形中，藉由套用轉換矩陣。This ellipse is obtained from the default circular shape by applying the transformation matrix. 請注意，會忽略矩陣的轉換部分。Note that the translation portion of the matrix is ignored. 因為矩陣傳回和屬性為畫筆的幾何轉換的複本，當您不再需要時，應該處置的矩陣。Because the matrix returned and by the property is a copy of the pen's geometric transform, you should dispose of the matrix when you no longer need it.

exception.span: 屬性設定於不可變動的 上，例如 類別傳回的項目。

span.span: The property is set on an immutable , such as those returned by the class.

span.span: This method prepends the translation to the transformation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以存取的測量單位物件使用其屬性。You can access the unit of measure of the object using its property. 測量單位，通常是像素為單位。The unit of measure is typically pixels. A為 0 會導致繪圖如同是 1。A of 0 will result in the drawing as if the were 1. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定作用的和屬性。The following code example demonstrates the effects of setting the and properties on a . 這個範例被為了搭配 Windows Form。This example is designed to be used with Windows Forms. 程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`ShowLineJoin`方法時處理表單的事件，將傳遞`e`為。Paste the code into a form and call the `ShowLineJoin` method when handling the form's event, passing `e` as .
